mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and yellow on white) Hatch poster announcing the Vanderbilt 1955 football schedule of home and away games. Handwritten notes indicate that the poster was used for planning the 1956 football schedule poster. Poster features metal photoplate of football players Larry Frank and Um Cunningham, commodore co-captains.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
